org.hps.monitoring.subsys.et

Class EtSystemStripCharts

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.record.AbstractRecordProcessor<org.jlab.coda.et.EtEvent>
      • org.hps.record.et.EtEventProcessor
        • org.hps.monitoring.subsys.et.EtSystemStripCharts
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SystemStatisticsListener, RecordProcessor<org.jlab.coda.et.EtEvent>

    public class EtSystemStripCharts
extends EtEventProcessor
implements SystemStatisticsListener
    This will show a series of strip charts from ET system performance statistics such as event and data rates.
